member.name: T:Senkel.IO.Paths.DirectoryPath
member.summary: Implements the interface for decorating other subpaths of the directory corresponding to the represented path.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.DirectoryPath.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that uses the specified path as a representation of the corresponding directory.
member.param: The path of the directory to represent that is determined by the method.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.DirectoryPath.#ctor(Senkel.Model.Decorating.IDuplexDecorator{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that uses the specified path as a representation of the corresponding directory.
member.param: The path decorator that the path of the represented directory is decorated by.
The path of the directory to represent that is determined by the method.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.DirectoryPath.Decorate(System.String)
member.summary: Decorates by joining the input string to the directory path captured in the property.
member.param: The string value to join to the directory path.
member.returns: The resulting string consisting of the input string joined to the path of the represented directory.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.DirectoryPath.ToString
member.summary: Returns the property value of the object which is the represented path of a directory.

member.name: T:Senkel.IO.Paths.ExtensionPath
member.summary: Represents an implementation of the interface that adds a the specified extension string, that is initialized in the constructor, to a path.

member.name: P:Senkel.IO.Paths.ExtensionPath.Extension
member.summary: The extension that is used for extending a path.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.ExtensionPath.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that used the specified extension.
member.param: The file extension to be used by the class that is determined by the method.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.ExtensionPath.#ctor(Senkel.Model.Decorating.IDuplexDecorator{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that used the specified extension.
member.param: The path decorator that the path with the corresponding extension is decorated by.
The file extension to be used by the class that is determined by the method.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.ExtensionPath.Decorate(System.String)
member.summary: Decorates by returning a string with an added extension based on the property.
member.param: The string value to add an extension to.
member.returns: The string with an extension added to it.

member.name: T:Senkel.IO.Paths.FilePath
member.summary: Represents a file at the specified path that can be based on an object for decorating the path.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.FilePath.#ctor(Senkel.Model.Decorating.IDuplexDecorator{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class where the specified path is decorated by the given object.
member.param: The path decorator that the path of the represented file is decorated by.
The path that is decorated by the given object that is determined by the method.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.FilePath.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified path.
member.param: The path that represents the file of the .

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Paths.FilePath.ToString
member.summary: Returns the property value of the object which is the represented path of a file.
